name: InputAssembler
description: Gathers raw data from your website, Google Search Console, and the public web to form a foundational dataset.

name: ContextPack
description: Structures, cleans, and enriches the input data into a unified, machine-readable model of your brand's digital presence.

name: Audit Modules
description: A set of seven specialized AI agents that analyze the ContextPack, each focusing on a different facet of AI-SEO performance.

name: Output Surfaces
description: Synthesizes findings from all modules into dashboards, reports, and prioritized recommendations for human review.
